text:
It seems that mod_cache insists on adding an Expires header to all responses,
but I'd like them to have only the Last-Modified that I set.
creator: eric.jain@gmail.com
rpluem@apache.org
text:
Fixed in trunk as r539621 (http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&rev=539621) and
backported to 2.2.x as r553600 (http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&rev=553600).
